metadata.description: Beware the beast man, for he is the devil’s pawn. Raised as brothers but separated by slave traders, Tarzan and his ape brother Caesar reunite when the war between man and ape takes them from the jungles of Africa to the center of the earth. From the writers of Revival and Power Man and Iron Fist! A co-publication with Boom! Studios!
metadata.name: Tarzan on the Planet of the Apes
